entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
